item.title: PhD Year 1 Semester 2 Recap and Summer Plans
item.description: Going to keep this update brief as I will be doing a lot more blogging this summer (more on that later)! This semester was incredibly challenging. Probably the hardest semester of work and school I have ever countered. Yet as things in life tend to do, everything came together at the finish line. Class projects, research expectations, and personal goals. I completed the first stage in the doctoral process at UMD - the Comprehensive Portfolio.

item.title: PhD Year 1 Semester 1 Recap
item.description: What a wild ride this semester has been! It’s 2:03AM on 1/3/2020. Considering what has happened in the past two hours, everything I’ve done seems a bit trivial. But we press on. I’m most proud of arcospy, a python translation of an existing R package. More info here. The TLDR is that I built a python API that allows users to query the Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) ARCOS opioid dataset for 2006-2012.
